Hotel Centre Park add the name suggests it's situated exactly in the Centre of Bhawanipatna District HQ. It's an excellent hotel with great ambience, excellent spacious rooms,  excellent restaurant servicing delicious food with best service.  It happens to be my College friend's hotel. He and his son who are managing the Hotel take every care to ensure that their guests go there to feel like home away from home. They go the extra mile. Food here is excellent. Hotel has a Conference Hall for meetings and get-togethers.  Hotel kept in very neat and clean manner. Don't miss to stay in this hotel for a good remembrance which is very nearer to the Bus Station and only about 3kms from the Railway Station. The room rents are also deadly cheap. Enjoy your stay in Hotel Centre Park.

Nestled in the heart of our charming town, the Oldest Hotel stands as a testament to history and hospitality. I recently had the pleasure of dining at the oldest hotel in town, from its rich heritage to its sumptuous cuisine and state-of-the-art conference hall, the Oldest Hotel has everything one could desire for a memorable event.

Upon entering the hotel, the vintage architecture and elegant decor transport visitors back in time, offering a glimpse of the town's past.

The main highlight of the Oldest Hotel undoubtedly lies in its culinary offerings. The food is exceptional, surpassing even the highest of expectations. The restaurant serves a delectable array of dishes, catering to diverse tastes and preferences. The flavors danced on my taste buds, leaving a lasting impression that will draw me back for more.

Aside from the delightful dining experience, the hotel boasts an impressive conference hall, which serves as the perfect venue for both marriage ceremonies and birthday parties. The hall is spacious, tastefully decorated, and equipped with modern amenities to ensure every event runs smoothly. During the birthday celebration I attended, the hall was adorned with elegant decorations, and the staff had meticulously arranged everything according to the host's preferences. The event coordinator was organized and efficient, ensuring that every detail was attended to, leaving the guests free to enjoy the festivities without a worry.

However, I must note that the age of the building, while adding to its charm, might result in some minor wear and tear in certain areas. Nonetheless, this is hardly a deterrent, as the impeccable service and culinary delights more than make up for it.

In conclusion, the Oldest Hotel in town is an absolute gem, catering to all needs from exceptional dining experiences to hosting unforgettable events. Whether you are a history enthusiast, a food lover, or someone looking to host a special occasion, this hotel will undoubtedly exceed your expectations. I wholeheartedly recommend the Oldest Hotel to both locals and visitors alike, as it truly embodies the essence of our town's heritage while embracing the contemporary demands of modern hospitality.
